div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xxij die
Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to Johne
sclugy to preywe that he hede pait to William philp thre stane of woll
or' the avale of it

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane assis' thomas prat forspekar
that Williame philp is avand to Walter atkin xliij s' and iiij d' scottis
money quhilk the balyeis chargit to pay within terme of law

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next
cumis to Robert ouchterles to Comper befor thame and ordanit the officiaris
to pas' and warne Jonhne gilespy to be thar' the saide day to ansuer'
to the saide Robert for the landis clamit be the saide Robert that thai
mycht minster Justice equalie to batht the saide partiis eftir the tenor'
of the deliuerance of ane bill gevin be the lordis of our Souerane lordis
Consale tharapone

xxv die mensis Augusti Johannes gilespy fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
Alexandrum chamer de murchile Dauid mathesone et Willelmum blinsel coniunctim et diuisim suos
legittimos procuratores ad respondendum Roberto ouchterles' penes clameum terrarum ab eo calumpniato
et cetera ad agendum defendendum prosequendum et calumpniandum In vberiore forma
procuratorij promitten' de Rato et grato cum omnibus terminis necessariis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene de tenta in pretorio
eiusdem xxv die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day Comperit Alexander chamer of murchill D and Dauid
mathesone procuratouris to Jonhne Sclugy of Sclugy
gilespy ande producit ane Instrument vndir the Sele of
thomas fyf bailye for the tyme makand' mencione that
that the saide Jonhne was in possessione of ane lande liand'
in the Castalgate one the Southt part of the samyn gate betuix
the lande of Dauid mathesone one the Est parte and the lande of
Jonhne malisone on the west parte In ane Croft liand beside
our lady well betuix the croft of Williame Kimdy one the
Southt parte Ande in ane rude pece of land liand in the grene
betuix the lande of vmquhile John gregory one the Southt and the
land of Wilyeame modane on the northt' eftir the tenor' of
the letter of Sesin direct' fra the kingis chapell

The saide day the court wardit Schew for law and gaff for dome
that Jonhne Sclugy falyeit in his preywe of the pament of thre
pent Stane of woll and the valour' of It to William philpe
and aw to pay the saide thre Stanis of woll within terme of law

The said day the aldirman and balyeis offerit thame redy to minster
Justice to Robert ouchterles anent ale thingis that he hed to say to
Johne of gilespy and his procuratouris beand present offerit thame redy
to abid' at the minstracion of Justice befor the aldirman and
balyeis Ande the saide Robert refusit to follow or persew ony
thingis befor the saide Jugis that tyme

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die
Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit friday eftir the law day next eftir
the fest of Sanct michaell to Androu murray eldar to ansuer
to the burghe' strekit one him be Dauid menyeis that he wranguislie
postponis deferris and refusis the resat of iiijxx li' vsual money of Scotland'
for the redempcion of ane half nethis fischingis of the furdis annaleit
to him be Alexander menyeis the quhilk Androw promittit that quhat tyme he
promittit pait him lxxx li' betuix this and mertimes ane yer' thareftir
he sulde renvnce al richt and clame of richt of the saide fischingis
to the saide Dauid Ande discernit the copy of the said' borghe to the
saide Androw

The saide day Johne Steuarte in Ane amerciament of the court be ane suorne
assis' Alexander chamer forspekar for the wranguis' Intrometinge with ane
barrel of tar' of murthow blakis to amend' as law wile and forber' in
tyme to Cum

The saide day Jonhne Steuarte in ane amerciament of the court for the wranguis'
strubulance of murthow blak and to amend as law wil and forber' in tym
to Cum Ande the saide murthow in ane amerciament of the court for the wranguis'
strubulance of the saide Johne and to amend' as law wile and forber' in
tyme to cum

the saide day it was fundin and deliuerit be the saide assis' Alexander
Chamer forspekar that murthow gl blak wrangit in the contempcione
of the aldirman and the officiaris of the toune

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die
Septembris anno quo supra

the saide day hary Inglisman and the Schip quyt of al skathis
of Williame gareauche schip and be ane Suorne assis' Wil
yeame blinsel forspekar and thome matland' in Ane amerciament of
the court for the wranguis' follouing of the said Inglisman
and schipe be strintht of ane borghe' and the said schip and Inglis
man quyt of his challance

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Williame blinsel forspekar that Dauid mar' is avand' to
gilbert menyeis thretty schillingis gretis And the saide
gilbert quyt of iiij li' g' and v s' g' clamit be the saide
Dauid'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem ixo
die Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Robert blinsel forspekar that gif Alexander rede aldirman and Robert
rede his brothir wil Suer' the gret aithez' that the said
Alexander has pait to sere Jonhne rederfurd' or to his factoris
j barrel Salmond' he is quyt of the saide knichtis challance
and the balye assignit friday that next cumis to the said Alexander
and his brothir to depone the said aithe

the saide day the aldirmane and balyeis assignit this day
xv dais to Jonhne Wormet to ansuer perempturlie to the
borghe Strekit one him be Jonhne moir for the wranguislie
haldin fra him of vij barrelis of Salmonde of his wattir maile
and the saide Jonhne Wormet allegit that he hede ane acquitance
of the saide Salmond

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit friday that next
cumis to Alexander perpont to cum and persew the personis that he
is complanteous' one Ande the saide Alexander askit and requirit
that Jonhne Colisone suld' be warnit to the saide day to ansuer'
to the thingis that he hede to say to him And the aldirman and
balyeis ordanit philp Dunbrek officiar' to pas' and warne the
saide Jonhne befor witnes sufficientlie to comper the saide day
to ansuer' to the saide Alexander eftir the tenor of the kingis lettres
directit tharapone

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo
die Septembris Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit the law day eftir
michaelmes day to Jonhne greif hatmakar to ansuer to Jhon'
ramsay hatmakar as he that allegis that the saide Jonhne greif is
his prenteis and thome hatmakar come Souerte to entir the saide Johne
greif the saide day and the saide John ramsay taxt xij d' Ilkan day et cetera

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday
that next cumis to Jonhne Colisone to ansuer to Alexander perpont
Inglisman and mercheand of londone for al Sommes of money
and gudis ande for al vthiris thingis that he has to say to him
And in likuis' thai ordanit the saide Alexander to ansuer to
the saide Jonhne for ale Somes of money and gudis and for
ale vthiris thingis that he has to say to him eftir the tenor'
of our Souerane lordis lettres direkit to thame tharapone

The saide day Alexander rede aldirman and Robert rede his brothir
deponit the gretis aithe that the saide Alexander rede has pait the
barrell of Salmond clamit be sere Johne ruthirfurd and aw him
nay Salmond of nay termes bigan

The saide day Jonhne andirsone grantit to gif to Wilyeam
andirson eldar his brothir ane writ to get ix li' g' xviij s'
g' and Sex g' In hary noblis Ilkan pece for xv s' g'
fra mastir thomas ramerss' opidane of the campveris
and the saide the saide Jonhne saide and the saide William gettis
nocht' his saide money he sal ger' him be pait' of it'
and the saide Jonhne deliuerit the copy of ane obligacion
to the saide Wilyeame to ask his said money

The saide day Jonhne of Culane lauchfullie callit and nocht
comperit to ansuer to the borghe strekit one him be fransy
culane for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xxtj s' with the
mair' tharfor the balyeis ordanit thomas Jamesone seriand to pas'
and tak ane Streys' fra the saide Jonhne and latt it to borghe
agane gif it be askit and warne him to the law day to
the law day to ansuer to the saide borghe

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvo
die Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day the action' debatabile dependand' vndecidit betuix
Jonhne Colisone one that ane part Ande alexander perpont Inglisman and
merchand of londone one that wthir parte eftir the tenoris of the ak obefor
is continevit with consent of batht the said partiis to friday that next
cumis in hoipe of concord but preiudice tile ony part in siclik strintht
force and effect as it was obefor

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of the Consale and communite
grantit and Sett to Alexander chamer in the schipraw the rudmalis for five
yeris next hereftir he payand yerlie fyve pundis vsual money of
Scotland for the said rude malis and thai haue quiet'clamit him
of the Remanent of the said malys Induringe the said termes
for the wyne takin fra him to the kingis propin and ordanit to
mak him ane assedacion herapon'

The said day Robert crage Alexander gray and Alexander angosone Ilkan
of thame has lent fourty Schillingis to the tone to quhilkis
was gevin in ane propine to the Duk of ros' for the quhilkis
the tone grantit to be thankfule to thame at the next
generale assedacion' And to haue and to thame gif ony
takis wakis conuenient for thame Ande to help thame befor
vthiris Ande falyeinge tharof the tone sal pay tham the saide
money within ane yer' hereftir

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die
Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day Androw goldsmitht deponit the gret aithe that Dauid'
Kintor' yongar causit him to writ the bill that come to William
blinsell out of byrrone fra the saide Dauid

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxijo die
Septembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes Sclugy in Amerciamento Curie per assisam ex ore Willelmi
blinsel pro perturbio Willelmi gareauche senioris

Eodem die dictus Johannes amerciatur pro perturbio famule Alexandri crage quibus
emendabit ut Jura volunt Infra sponsa sua amerciatur perturbio
margarete Allansone

the xxiijtj day of September' the yer' forsaid' Jonhne moir' follouit
Jonhne Wormet for the wranguis' haldin fra him of ane barrel of
Salmond' and the saide Johne Wormet grantit him aving ane
barrel of girls' to the saide Jhon' and denyit the barrell of Salmond'
and the saide Jhon' moir' tuk to mak it gude with Johne
Colisone and gilbert Wellis Ande the aldirman and balyeis assignit
friday that next cumis to batht the said partiis and the saide Jhon'
Wormet grantit to be thar' the saide day to do that accordis
of law

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die
Septembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Sponsa Johannis Sanclar amerciatur pro perturbio Dauid
menyes Et similiter pro iniusta deiectione Scale de terra dicti Dauid
Ac pro perturbio gilberti menyes quibus emendabit ut iura volunt
Et hoc ex ore thome prat prelocutoris assise Jurate

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die
Septembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Adam ruthirfurd in amerciamento Curie pro perturbio
Alexandri angousone senioris per iuratam assisam ex ore Willelmj blinsele
prelocutoris eiusdem emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die dictus Adam amerciatur pro perturbio Agnetis prat sponse dicti
Alexandri / Idem adam amerciatur pro perturbio Willelmi Wormet et Johannis
Retre quibus emendabit ut Jura volunt et Ipsi omnes quiti
de omni perturbio dicti ade

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurde de tarlane miles deuenit plegius
legalis per manus ostensionem quod Willelmus Wormet Johannes retre
et Andreas Kennartj erunt Indempnes pro ada ada ruthirfurd et
parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Robertus Culane deuenit
plegius legalis per manus ostensionem quod dictus adam erit Indempnis pro
prefato Willelmo et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Richardus
Waus deuenit plegius legalis per manum quod dictus Adam erit
Indempnis pro prefato Johanne et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris
Jacobus Kennarty senior deuenit plegius legalis per manum quod dictus
Adam erit Indempnis pro dicto Andrea et parte sua aliter quam
per viam iuris Et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur per manus
ad conseruandum suo plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi
fideiussione
